mapper.update: update collect set pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, statu = #{statu,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pro_id, user_id, statu, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_deleted from collect where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
